org.mxupdate.eclipse
Class Messages

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.eclipse.Messages

public final class Messages
extends Object

Utility class to handle message translation for the MxUpdate eclipse plug-in.

Version:
$Id: Messages.java 689 2010-01-31 14:51:02Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Constructor Detail

Messages

private Messages()
Constructor is defined to avoid creating an instance of this message utility class.

Method Detail

getString

public static String getString(String _key,
                               Object... _arguments)
Translated given key by using the resource bundle RESOURCE_BUNDLE. The translated key is then formated (with the message formatter MessageFormat). If the key could not be translated, the key itself surrounded with !!! is returned.

Parameters:
_key - key to translate
_arguments - arguments to used to fill into the translated string
Returns:
translated string for key; or if key could not be translated, original key surrounded with "!!!".
See Also:
RESOURCE_BUNDLE
